item.title: This is my test blog post
item.description: Rev Annnnnnny-Second-Now The function super_optimized_calculation is a Fibonacci generator. To solve this chall, we just use the 90th Fibonacci number and modulo it by each number in the v6 array. Code: js-safe After deobfuscating the code, we can see that the function addToPassword use some operation to check the pass code. If true, it uses this pass code as a key to decrypt the AES encrypted flag. function addToPassword(_0x43b7e8) { if (_0x12b1c8.
